EmailTemplate.name: HEVT-202307-xSEG-FRM-POST-FORUM.Email #2 (Forum 2023 Survey Reminder)
EmailTemplate.subject: Forum 2023 Survey Reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=Attendee}},
Thanks again for attending this year’s Forum! We were so happy to host you in Boston and hope that you enjoyed your time spent with healthcare leaders from across the world to share perspectives, insights, best practices, and strategies.
If you haven’t already, be sure to fill out your survey <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/RFC7Z38]]> for a chance to win one of three SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speakers.* *Teladoc Health will give away three speakers, one speaker set to three Forum Attendees who have submitted fully-completed surveys. Surveys must be completed and submitted by August 4th. No more than one prize per person; Teladoc Health employees are not eligible for the promotion.
About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals. Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> | Privacy <[[https://www.teladochealth.com/legal/privacy-policy]]> | Legal notice <[[https://www.teladochealth.com/legal/legal-disclaimer]]> © Teladoc Health, Inc. All rights reserved. 2 Manhattanville Road, Purchase NY, 10577.
